Bell View

Bell View is a computer program for church bell ringers for looking up methods and acts as a front end for CRE.

With Bell View, one can view methods with a nice blue line (or for that matter any other coloured line), print them out, see what effect bobs and singles have on the plain course and even hear how they sound!

For more information, please refer to the Bell View manual. It is available from 

www.harrogatebellringers.org/bellview
